actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow all taxpayers a credit against income tax for up to $200 of charitable contributions.

summary.text: Charitable Giving Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish, for all taxpayers, a charitable contribution tax credit of up to $200. States that such credit shall be in lieu of any deduction otherwise allowed for such contribution.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow all taxpayers a credit against income tax for up to $200 of charitable contributions.
